member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget
member.summary: NLog Target that routes all logging output to the Application Insights logging framework. The messages will be uploaded to the Application Insights cloud service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.#ctor
member.summary: Initializers a new instance of ApplicationInsightsTarget type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.InstrumentationKey
member.summary: The Application Insights instrumentationKey for your application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.TelemetryClient
member.summary: The logging controller we will be using.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.InitializeTarget
member.summary: Initializes the Target and perform instrumentationKey validation.
member.exception: Will throw when is not set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.NLogTarget.ApplicationInsightsTarget.Write(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.summary: Send the log message to Application Insights.
